title: Neuronal PARIS-STAT3 axis drives tau pathology and glial activation in Alzheimer's disease.
abstract: PARIS, a substrate of Parkin, accumulates in Parkinson's disease and promotes disease progression. Here, we demonstrate that PARIS also contributes to Alzheimer's disease by elevating
